title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Skills: Digital Learning Experience Design for Nursing Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing practice knowledge and ability to utilize digital devices
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply infectious disease management protocols with 90% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can independently execute patient monitoring scenarios using mobile devices at least three times.
Learners can provide two or more peer-reviewed feedbacks on nursing skills via digital learning platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
